title: The Principles of Durable Execution Explained
description: What Durable Execution is, how it works, and why it's beneficial to your system.

title: Cloud skills gap - focusing on the wrong problem
description: There have been a couple recent posts that I've read about the cloud skills gap including some conversations on Twitter that I think are focusing on the wrong problem.

title: KubeCon Talk: Kubernetes in Production at Buffer
description: At KubeCon 2016, I gave a talk about how we started using Kuberentes at Buffer including our learnings along the way.

title: How We’re Implementing Service-Oriented Architecture at Buffer After 6 years of Technical Buildup
description: As Buffer is well into into it’s sixth year of existence, we’ve evolved a lot as an engineering team. Now our architecture is evolving again.
